text: While aelf might sound like elf, we're not in the business of magic and fantasy! The name aelf stands for an AI-enhanced layer 1 blockchain network, designed to make your Web3 experience more efficient and secure. Think of it as the high-tech cousin of elves, bringing magic to the blockchain world through innovation and technology. And as for the spelling--consider it our unique twist to stand out in the digital realm!
title: Is aelf an elf? Why is it spelt differently?
